#summary Lateral Geniculate Nucleus
@@[Home] -> [BiologicalLifeResearch] -> [BrainAreaNSA] -> [BrainRegionNSA_FD_LGN]
----

This page covers biological details of component Lateral Geniculate Nucleus.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Forebrain Diencephalon -> Thalamus (FD.TH) -> Lateral Geniculate Nucleus (NSA.FD.LGN) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: nucleus
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaNSA Neocortical Brain - External Sensory Aggregation Area]
  * *Role*: relay
  * *Function*: Temporal decorrelation
  * *Notes to function*: Only 10% of inputs to LGN come from the retina. 90% are modulatory inputs from cortex and the brainstem
